original_text: So Achish called David to come to him. He said, ‘As surely as the Lord lives, I know that I can trust you. I would like you to go with me to fight the battle. Since the first day that you came to me, I have never found anything wrong with you. But the other leaders do not trust you. So Achish called David to come to him. He said, ‘As surely as the Lord lives, I know that I can trust you. I would like you to go with me to fight the battle. Since the first day that you came to me, I have never found anything wrong with you. But the other leaders do not trust you.
korean_text: 아기스가 다윗을 불러 그에게 이르되 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노니 네가 정직하여 내게 온 날부터 오늘까지 네게 악이 있음을 보지 못하였으니 나와 함께 진중에 출입하는 것이 내 생각에는 좋으나 수령들이 너를 좋아하지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: So Achish called David to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아기스가 다윗을 자기에게 오라고 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: As surely as the Lord lives,
I know that I can trust you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신을 믿을 수 있다는 것을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I would like you to go with me to fight the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 나와 함께 전투에 가기를 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: Since the first day that you came to me,
I have never found anything wrong with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신에게서 어떤 잘못도 찾은 적이 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the other leaders do not trust you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 지도자들은 당신을 믿지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: So Achish called David to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아기스가 다윗을 자기에게 오라고 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: As surely as the Lord lives,
I know that I can trust you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신을 믿을 수 있다는 것을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I would like you to go with me to fight the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 나와 함께 전투에 가기를 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: Since the first day that you came to me,
I have never found anything wrong with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신에게서 어떤 잘못도 찾은 적이 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the other leaders do not trust you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 지도자들은 당신을 믿지 않습니다.
